title: Re: Billy Blaze: Wrestler...?
content:
Mort's Dad: C'mon son, put that mysterious control with the red button away and come do the dishes.

Mort: But Da-ad...

Dad: DON'T YOU "BUT DA-AD" ME IN FRONT OF OUR GUESTS, SUNSHINE!

Mort: Yes Dad.

Billy: [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img] Oh, it's alright Bob, my kids are just as bad... Heh heh.

Dad: Kids eh? Well, gotta bring 'em up right, or who knows what they'll do? GET IN THE KITCHEN, LAD!
